description: The RCMP have a requirement for the supply, delivery and offloading of vehicular LED traffic advisors to locations across Canada.
full_summary:
## Vehicle LED Traffic Advisor Tender

**Reference Number**: AB2037E

**Solicitation Number**: 202206375B

**Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, January 17, 2024, 2:00 PM ET

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) intends to establish up to two National Standing Offers (NISOs) for the supply, delivery and offloading of vehicular LED (Light Emitting Diode) traffic advisors to locations across Canada.

The following streams are part of the tender:

*   **Stream 1**: Universal LED Traffic Advisors are widely used in marked and unmarked general duty police vehicles. These masters allow the re-use of lighting in various vehicle applications throughout the country
*   **Stream 2**: Internal Vehicle Specific LED Traffic Advisors are used in marked and unmarked vehicles. These traffic advisors provide a more concealed means of alerting other drivers of police presence. This being chest headlights signifies specific utilization of this component

Bidders must review the terms and conditions of the tender carefully before submitting their proposals.

**Required Documents and Attachments**:

*   The bidding documents can be accessed by clicking on the following links:
    *   [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24418/202206375b---LED%20traffic%20advisor%20-%20Land%20Transport%20%26%20Infrastructure%20ICT%20-%20Tender%20package%204_n.pdf?O3js269gdp)
    *   [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24418/202206375b---feux-directionnels-a-del_0.pdf)

Eligible bidders must submit their proposals in both English and French on or before the closing date of January 17, 2024, 2:00 PM ET. It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure compliance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation and the tender documents. Do not hesitate to reach out to us with any query you may have regarding this RFP. 

We hope this rewritten text meets the requirements. I've kept the original content and only made necessary changes to enhance clarity, coherence and grammar, while staying within the 400-word limit. You are always welcome to edit this text further for your needs.

Best regards,
